ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: woah, that sure was a long thread that came from this.  i figured it out though, Whee.  you just love to argue =P Shada, 58 Bard and Hackle Hammer enabled
ygData.messageBody:
woah, that sure was a long thread that came from this. i figured it out
though, Whee. you just love to argue =P

Shada, 58 Bard and Hackle Hammer enabled
Afterlife

----- Original Message -----
From: "Jeffrey Sue" <jsue@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 9:28 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


I never said it was earth shattering. I merely am pointing out that
people
tend
to exaggerate the facts when they get something put in their head from
other
more vocal people.

and yeah, it was an amazing amount of damage for me compared to how much
damage i usually do on these things, hehehehe.

and you can't really discount pvp, it is a part of the game.
